sentences.sentence: Bordure or Border - Frequently adopted as a "difference" between relatives bearing the same arms.
sentences.translation: 图案边界的标志物-一般采纳“由于近亲生育产生的某种‘差异’”之解。

sentences.sentence: Bordure or Border - Frequently adopted as a "difference" between relatives bearing the same arms.
sentences.translation: 图案边界的标志物-一般用以作为一种标示，区别那些大体相近的纹章。
